data.title: HE, SHE, IT by Piercy, Marge
data.meta_description: 1st Edition - Hardcover - New York: Alfred A. Knopf, 1991. dj - Dust Jacket Included - Hardcover first edition - First printing. Piercy's highly praised science fiction novel - an interweaving of 2 stories, one that of a young woman in the 21st century in the vast toxic wasteland that used to be North America, the other a kabbalist in the 16th century in Prague's Jewish ghetto. Very near fine in a like dustjacket. - HE, SHE, IT

Terms of Sale:

Bookfever.com is a partnership between Christine Volk and Eugene Iiams, Booksellers. Our mailing address is PO Box 696, Ione CA 95640 USA. Our store - Books Upstairs - is located at 5 Main Street, Jackson, CA 95642 USA. Email: chris@bookfever.com. Phone: 209-274-6960. All dustjackets are in archival mylar covers, and books are packed carefully for shipping. We do not use stock photos. All pictures accompanying our listings are of our books. We accept Mastercard, Visa AMEX, Discover, checks or Pa...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Low cost media mail shipping in the US with delivery confirmation and insurance when appropriate. ALL dust jackets are covered with archival protectors. All books are PACKED CAREFULLY; we are also happy to gift wrap books (FREE) upon request, and to ship them with just a card. An online bookseller since 1993, on ABE since 1997! While occasionally a book sells out, we only list books which we have in stock, and ready to ship. NOTE our low PRIORITY and INTERNATIONAL RATES - Please do not hesitate to contact us to confirm availability or with any questions - we can be reached at heyyou@bookfever.com or at 209*274*6960. Reciprocal terms offered to the trade on direct orders only. Libraries and other institutions may request to be invoiced.
